Title: Relates to enacting "Sahim's law"
Summary: Relates to enacting "Sahim's law"; allows family members to bring civil actions on behalf of incarcerated individuals; establishes certain confidentiality requirements regarding civil actions brought against correction facility staff by or on behalf of incarcerated individuals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the confidentiality of certain actions brought by or on behalf of incarcerated individuals
